page.title: 07Our Family At Home
page.content: On week days we get up at 7.30. We have breakfast of cereal,toast and a cup of tea then Mum and Dad go to work and we go to school. In some homes only one parent goes to work,usually Dad. Mum stays to look after the baby and do the house work. We have sandwiches or a school dinner and go back home at 3.30pm. We have a cooked tea sausages or fishfingers and chips or something on toast. We watch television and play until bed time at about 10.00. At weekends we get up later, shop and visit our relations. Dad often goes to the club and sometimes does some gardening or washes up. We have electric appliances to do the house work, vacume cleaners, dishwashers, automatic washing machines. We have just had a microwave for fast cooking.I earn pocket money by helping with jobs.
